attributes.action: change the law so that cyclists need a  MOT and Insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All cyclists should have a MOT to ensure there vehicle / bike is safe if used on the highways also Insurnace should be compulsory to protect the cyclists and the pubilc should an accident / incident causing damage can be compensated

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/insurance-cert/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
